activities.name: Summit Rock Climbing Gym
activities.description: Indoor climbing gym with routes for all skill levels. Features top-rope, lead climbing, and bouldering areas.

activities.name: Glacier Peak Ice Climbing
activities.description: Winter ice climbing tours with certified guides. Includes equipment and safety training.

activities.name: Alpine Adventures Hiking
activities.description: Scenic mountain hikes with experienced guides. Day trips and multi-day expeditions available.

activities.name: Peak Performance Bouldering
activities.description: Dedicated bouldering center with over 200 problems. Regular competitions and training sessions.

activities.name: Via Ferrata Extreme
activities.description: Protected climbing routes with metal cables and ladders. Perfect for beginners wanting mountain experience.

activities.name: Expedition Base Camp
activities.description: Multi-day alpine trekking expeditions with overnight stays in mountain huts.
